title: "Putin doesn't look ready to negotiate but to escalate the war in order to fulfill his goals," Borrell says. "His goals have ...
content: "Putin doesn't look ready to negotiate but to escalate the war in order to fulfill his goals," Borrell says. "His goals have been clear since the beginning: to conquer, to occupy and to subjugate Ukraine, a European country, a candidate country to the European Union."
author: Live UA Map
